short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: wstool - Browser extension for initiating WhatsApp chats without saving the mobile number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily Start WhatsApp Chats Without Saving Contacts

With this browser extension, you can instantly open WhatsApp chats without needing to save the phone number. Ideal for anyone who communicates with new clients or contacts frequently and wants to keep their phonebook organized.

Key Benefits:
✅ Quick Chat Access: Begin WhatsApp conversations with any number directly from your browser.
✅ No Need to Save Contacts: Keep your contact list tidy by avoiding temporary or one-time saves.
✅ Fast and Easy to Use: Simply enter the phone number with the country code and click to start chatting on WhatsApp.
✅ Privacy-Focused: The extension doesn’t collect any data—your conversations remain between you and the contact.

Simple Setup to Expand Your Business:
Go to web.whatsapp.com
Link your WhatsApp account by scanning the QR code.
Launch the WhatSender Pro extension and enter the recipients’ phone numbers.
Don’t forget to include the local or international country code!
Whether you’re a professional managing client conversations or just connecting with new people without adding them to your contact list, this extension is the perfect tool for a streamlined WhatsApp experience.

Powered by WSTOOL PRO
